 2019-09942019-07-01,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisReppointment of RICHARD SEXTON of Petawawa, Ontario, as the President and Chief Executive Officer of Atomic Energy of Canada Limited, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year or until such time as a new President and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective February 7, 2020.
